name: They Were Warned!
description:
A game where you play as the monster trying to destroy a city. I wanted to make a game based on the old Missile Command game, but try to make it so the player was on the opposite side of things, rather than protecting a city, they are destroying it. This was my first major foray into 2D games and it turned out better than I expected.

How to Play:

Move using WASD

Shoot projectiles with the left mouse button

Grab pickups to increase health and projectile energy

Destroy most of the town without dying

Some things can be destroyed by just simply flying into them

Other things like gun turrets and orange walls can only be destroyed by shooting at them

Credits:

Created by Noah Souser
